input_text:
Job Title: Superintendent - Commercial Renovation/Remodels

Location: Raleigh, NC

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Job Title: Superintendent - Commercial

Location: Raleigh, NC and Richmond, VA

Salary Range: $80k - $120k DOE

Status: Onsite - NC, SC, GA, VA, etc

Requirements For This Position:

 At least 5+ Yrs. Commercial Construction Exp. At least 3+ Yrs. Superintendent Exp. Big Box Retail Exp. Preferred High School Diploma; College Degree is Preferred

We are a high level construction company providing services throughout North Carolina. We specialize in ground-up/remodel, commercial builds. If you are looking for an established construction company with great values and culture then apply right now!

If this sounds like you, please apply for this amazing opportunity. We are interviewing candidates this week and early next week.

What You Need for this Position

Must Haves:

 At least 5+ Yrs. Commercial Construction Exp. At least 3+ Yrs. Superintendent Exp. High School Diploma

Nice To Have:

 Big Box Retail Build Exp. Preferred 4 Year Related Degree

What's In It for You

Benefits:

 Salary - $80k - $120k DOE Medical, Dental, Vision 401k Match PTO

So, if you are a Superintendent with commercial experience, please apply today! Or, if you prefer to apply directly, please email to tim.ceballos@cybercoders.com.

Benefits

Looking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:

Email Your Resume In Word To:

Tim.Ceballos@CyberCoders.com

Please do NOT change the email subject line in any way. You must keep the JobID: linkedin : TC8-1796053 -- in the email subject line for your application to be considered.***

Tim Ceballos - Executive Recruiter - CyberCoders

Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.

CyberCoders is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer

All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, age, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, national origin, ancestry, citizenship, genetic information, registered domestic partner status, marital status, status as a crime victim, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law. CyberCoders will consider qualified applicants with criminal histories in a manner consistent with the requirements of applicable law. CyberCoders is committed to working with and providing reasonable accommodation to individuals with physical and mental disabilities. If you need special assistance or an accommodation while seeking employment, please contact a member of our Human Resources team to make arrangements.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
